title: When will custom ROMs be available for Realme devices, now that there is an official support for bootloader unlocking? - Quora

response.answer_text: What realme device do you have ? BTW, Custom ROM development is solely dependent on the developer. Its a tiresome process so whenever the dev gets the device and the time, they start building ROMs !There's no official date for it !! Just keep posting on xda, and hope the developer listens !! Hope it helps !!
